content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Join over 11 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG. Dragons have invaded Tamriel in The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr, part of the Season of the Dragon year-long adventure! Explore and defend the home of the Khajiit from an ancient evil, and command the undead with the Necromancer class.

The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr Digital Collector's Edition includes Summerset CE and Morrowind CE (Chapters  +  content) and the Base Game.

Exclusive Digital Collector’s Edition content:
• Exclusive Mount: Senche-Raht
• Exclusive Pet: Ashen Scar Jerboa
• Emote Pack: Khajiiti Cultural Pack
• Exclusive Outfit Style Conversions: Dragonbone Style
• Exclusive Memento: Archaic Lore Tablets

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


Network Players 2-99 - Full game requires PlayStation®Plus membership to access online multiplayer
DUALSHOCK®4
Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©2019 ZeniMax Media Inc. The Elder Scrolls® Online: Elsweyr™ developed by ZeniMax Online Studios LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. attributes.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr Collector's Edition
attributes.preorder-description:
Digital Pre-order Details:
Pre-order and receive a bonus after checking out:

THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE: TAMRIEL UNLIMITED

MORROWIND – CE PACK

SUMMERSET – CE PACK

THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE: SUMMERSET UPGRADE

THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE: ELSWEYR UPGRADE

RAHD-M'ATHRA HORSE MOUNT

THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE: MORROWIND UPGRADE



Pre-purchase The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr, part of the Season of the Dragon year-long adventure, for IMMEDIATE access to the Rahd-m'Athra Horse Mount and additional bonus in-game content at launch, including:
• Noble Clan Chief Costume
• Blue Dragon Imp Pet
• Treasure Maps
• Baandari Pedlar Crate
• Experience Scrolls

The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr launches on June 4, 2019.

Play on 06/04/2019 5am Eastern Time

CANCELLATIONS AND REFUNDS ARE NOT AVAILABLE EXCEPT WHERE REQUIRED BY LAW.
